title: Prairies Alive!
description: Prairies Alive! teaches readers all about the grasslands of the world. It highlights three types of North American grasslands, tells about the importance of fire, and explains the need to preserve the world's prairies. The book also gives detailed examples of the kinds of plants and animals found on the prairie. Photographs, illustrations, and captions support the text.
meta: bacteria, burrows, carnivores, drought, ecosystem, forage, fungi, grazing, herbivores, interactions, mammal, nutrients, rodents, species
